column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCL﻿Shelter is one of the most basic human needs, but the provision of that shelter - the development of enough housing of the right type and quality in the most appropriate locations - is a challenge that few, if any, governments in the Global North have fully addressed. This MSc offers an interdisciplinary perspective on the 'housing question' in advanced economies, with contributions from across the faculty and from external practitioners.
column7: Register your interest in graduate study at UCL﻿
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 5 years flexible
